# Test Fixtures

This directory contains sample PDF files for testing.

## Required Files

- `sample_form.pdf` - A sample PDF form with various field types (text, checkbox, radio, etc.)

## Creating Test PDFs

You can create sample PDFs using:
1. LibreOffice Writer - Create a form and export to PDF
2. Adobe Acrobat - Create fillable form fields
3. Online PDF form creators

The sample PDF should contain:
- Text fields (name, email, etc.)
- Checkboxes
- Radio buttons
- Dropdown/choice fields (optional)
